analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS status is Neutral at 44. Strong upward momentum pushed the score to 44 from 29, driven by a sharp 15.4% drop in VIX (Fear Index) and a weaker DXY (Dollar strength), which eases liquidity pressure. While narrowing credit spreads favor equities, the divergence in falling Crypto and surging Gold warrants caution before upcoming inflation data. Maintain neutral positioning; watch for continued VIX suppression to signal a broader recovery and risk-on stability.

reports.EN: GMS status is Neutral at 44. Strong upward momentum pushed the score to 44 from 29, driven by a sharp 15.4% drop in VIX (Fear Index) and a weaker DXY (Dollar strength), which eases liquidity pressure. While narrowing credit spreads favor equities, the divergence in falling Crypto and surging Gold warrants caution before upcoming inflation data. Maintain neutral positioning; watch for continued VIX suppression to signal a broader recovery and risk-on stability.
reports.ES: El GMS se sitÃºa en 44, entrando en un rÃ©gimen Neutral. El impulso alcista elevÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n desde 29, motivado por una caÃ­da del 15.4% en el VIX (Ã­ndice de miedo) y un DXY (fuerza del dÃ³lar) mÃ¡s dÃ©bil, lo que mejora la liquidez del mercado. Aunque los diferenciales de crÃ©dito se estrechan apoyando a las acciones, la debilidad en el sector Crypto y el auge del Oro sugieren cautela ante los prÃ³ximos datos de inflaciÃ³n. Mantenga una postura neutral en su cartera; observe si la supresiÃ³n de la volatilidad valida una recuperaciÃ³n mÃ¡s amplia y sostenida.

reports.ID: Skor GMS berada di angka 44, menunjukkan transisi ke rezim Netral. Momentum positif mendorong skor naik dari 29 ke 44, didorong oleh penurunan tajam VIX (indeks ketakutan) sebesar 15,4% dan pelemahan DXY (kekuatan dolar) yang memperbaiki likuiditas global. Meskipun penyempitan selisih kredit mendukung sektor ekuitas, penurunan pasar Kripto dan lonjakan harga Emas menunjukkan adanya kewaspadaan investor menjelang rilis data inflasi penting. Pertahankan posisi portofolio netral; pantau terus penekanan volatilitas untuk mendapatkan sinyal pemulihan pasar yang lebih luas.

reports.DE: Der GMS-Score liegt bei 44 und signalisiert den Ãœbergang in ein neutrales Regime. AufwÃ¤rtsmomentum trieb den Score von 29 auf 44, begÃ¼nstigt durch einen RÃ¼ckgang des VIX um 15,4 % und einen schwÃ¤cheren DXY, was die globale LiquiditÃ¤t verbessert. WÃ¤hrend engere Credit-Spreads die AktienmÃ¤rkte stÃ¼tzen, mahnen fallende Kryptopreise und das Erreichen neuer HÃ¶chststÃ¤nde bei Gold zur Vorsicht vor den anstehenden Inflationsdaten. Behalten Sie eine neutrale Positionierung bei und achten Sie auf eine dauerhafte Stabilisierung der VolatilitÃ¤t als Signal fÃ¼r eine breitere Markterholung.
reports.FR: Le score GMS se situe Ã  44, marquant une transition vers un rÃ©gime Neutre. L'Ã©lan haussier a propulsÃ© le score de 29 Ã  44, soutenu par une chute de 15,4 % du VIX (peur) et un affaiblissement du DXY (dollar), ce qui dÃ©tend la liquiditÃ© globale. Si le resserrement des spreads de crÃ©dit favorise les actions, la faiblesse des cryptomonnaies et l'envolÃ©e de l'or suggÃ¨rent une prudence sous-jacente avant les chiffres de l'inflation. Maintenez une exposition neutre et surveillez la compression de la volatilitÃ© pour confirmer un retour durable de l'appÃ©tit pour le risque.

news.title: S&P 500 rises, led by tech; Dow climbs to fresh record: Live updates
Novo Nordisk sues Hims & Hers over copycat versions of Wegovy drugs; Hims stock plunges 27%
Databricks completes $5 billion funding round at $134 billion valuation
Oracle gains 9% as tech tries to bounce back from $1 trillion sell-off
Cuba says international airlines can no longer refuel there as Trump turns up the pressure
Citizens turns bullish on this fintech stock, says risk-reward has improved after tech sell-off
